bioconda.name: rmblast
bioconda.summary: RMBlast is a RepeatMasker compatible version of the standard NCBI BLAST+ suite.

biocontainers.name: rmblast
biocontainers.summary: RMBlast is a RepeatMasker compatible version of the standard NCBI BLAST+ suite.

biotools.summary: RMBlast is a RepeatMasker compatible version of the standard NCBI blastn program. The primary difference between this distribution and the NCBI distribution is the addition of a new program "rmblastn" for use with RepeatMasker and RepeatModeler.

bioschemas.name: RMBlast
bioschemas.summary: RMBlast is a RepeatMasker compatible version of the standard NCBI blastn program. The primary difference between this distribution and the NCBI distribution is the addition of a new program "rmblastn" for use with RepeatMasker and RepeatModeler.
